recipes.title: Ring Kebab
recipes.preparation: Peel the eggplants with a zester and slice them half a finger wide. Then add salt to a bowl of water, stir, and soak the eggplants in water for 20 minutes to remove their bitterness. Slice the peeled onions in a circular shape.

recipes.title: Stuffed Eggplant Dish
recipes.preparation: Peel the eggplants in stripes and soak them in salty water for half an hour to prevent them from absorbing oil. After washing thoroughly, drain the water with a towel and fry them in a little oil. Fry 3 peppers in oil as well. Then sauté the chopped onions in the same pan, add the minced meat and sauté for a while. Add the peppers and garlic and sauté for another 2 minutes.

recipes.title: Chicken Sultan Kebab
recipes.preparation: Peel and dice the eggplant, then fry it in vegetable oil. Place it in a strainer and let it drain. In the meantime, sauté the chicken. Dice the chicken into bite-sized pieces and cook in a pot, stirring occasionally. When it changes color and releases its juice, add the finely chopped onion.
